entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 08:10 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: ENE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
